languages.text:
Очки пустотного перемещения (ОПП) определяют, как далеко может продвинуться судно в свой ход.
1 ОПП соответствует одной клетке на поле боя. Движение по диагонали стоит дороже — каждая вторая клетка отнимает по 2 ОПП.
В начале каждого хода очки пустотного перемещения восстанавливаются до максимального значения. Чем выше у судна показатель {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}скорости{/g}, тем выше значение его ОПП.
Обратите внимание: если ваше судно подвигалось, это действие нельзя отменить.

Void movement points (VMP) determine how far a ship can move on their turn.
1 VMP corresponds to one cell on the battlefield. Moving diagonally is more costly — every second diagonal cell uses 2 VMP.
At the beginning of each turn, void movement points are restored to their maximum value. The higher a ship's {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} rating is, the more VMP it gets.
Note that once your ship starts moving, this order can no longer be cancelled.
languages.original_text:
Очки пустотного перемещения (ОПП) определяют, как далеко может продвинуться судно в свой ход.
1 ОПП соответствует одной клетке на поле боя. Движение по диагонали стоит дороже — каждая вторая клетка отнимает по 2 ОПП.
В начале каждого хода очки пустотного перемещения восстанавливаются до максимального значения. Чем выше у судна показатель {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}скорости{/g}, тем выше значение его ОПП.
Обратите внимание: если ваше судно подвигалось, это действие нельзя отменить.

traits.locale_text:
Movement points (MP) determine how far a ship can move on their turn.
1 MP corresponds to one cell on the battlefield. Moving diagonally is more costly — every second diagonal cell use 2 MP.
At the beginning of each turn, movement points are restored to their maximum value. The higher a ship's {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} rating is, the more MP they get.
Note that once your ship starts moving, this order can no longer be cancelled.

1 MP corresponds to one cell on the battlefield. Moving diagonally is more costly — every second diagonal cell use 2 MP.
At the beginning of each turn, movement points are restored to their maximum value. The higher a ship's {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} rating is, the more MP they get.
Note that once your ship starts moving, this order can no longer be cancelled.

Void movement points (VMP) determine how far a ship can move on their turn.
1 VMP corresponds to one cell on the battlefield. Moving diagonally is more costly — every second diagonal cell uses 2 VMP.
At the beginning of each turn, void movement points are restored to their maximum value. The higher a ship's {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} rating is, the more VMP it gets.
Note that once your ship starts moving, this order can no longer be cancelled.

Void movement points (VMP) determine how far a ship can move on their turn.
1 VMP corresponds to one cell on the battlefield. Moving diagonally is more costly — every second diagonal cell uses 2 VMP.
At the beginning of each turn, void movement points are restored to their maximum value. The higher a ship's {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} rating is, the more VMP it gets.

languages.text:
Leere-Bewegungspunkte (LBP) bestimmen, wie weit sich ein Schiff mit seinem Zug bewegen kann.
1 LBP entspricht einem Feld auf dem Schlachtfeld. Diagonale Bewegungen benötigen mehr Leere-Bewegungspunkte ... jedes zweite diagonale Feld verbraucht 2 LBP.
Zu Beginn jedes Zuges werden die Leere-Bewegungspunkte auf ihren Maximalwert zurückgesetzt. Je höher der {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeitswert{/g} eines Schiffes ist, desto mehr LBP erhält es.
Beachte, dass dieser Befehl nicht mehr rückgängig gemacht werden kann, sobald sich dein Schiff in Bewegung setzt.
languages.original_text:
Void movement points (VMP) determine how far a ship can move on their turn.
1 VMP corresponds to one cell on the battlefield. Moving diagonally is more costly — every second diagonal cell uses 2 VMP.
At the beginning of each turn, void movement points are restored to their maximum value. The higher a ship's {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} rating is, the more VMP it gets.
Note that once your ship starts moving, this order can no longer be cancelled.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:*__MovementPointsSpace**}BP{/g}) bestimmen, wie weit sich ein Schiff in seinem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} bewegen kann.
1 BP entspricht einem Feld auf dem Schlachtfeld. Diagonale Bewegungen benötigen mehr Bewegungspunkte – jedes zweite diagonale Feld verbraucht 2 BP.
Zu Beginn jeder Runde werden die Bewegungspunkte auf ihren Maximalwert zurückgesetzt. Je höher der {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}Geschwindigkeitswert{/g} eines Schiffes ist, desto mehr BP erhält es.
Beachte, dass dieser Befehl nicht mehr rückgängig gemacht werden kann, sobald sich dein Schiff in Bewegung setzt.

languages.text:
Les points de déplacement dans le vide (PDV) déterminent la distance qu'un vaisseau peut parcourir lors de son tour.
1 PDV correspond à une case du champ de bataille. Le coût des déplacements en diagonale est plus élevé : une case diagonale sur deux coûte 2 PDV.
Au début de chaque tour, les points de déplacement dans le vide sont restaurés à leur valeur maximale. Plus l'indice de {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g} d'un vaisseau est élevé, plus il reçoit de PDV.
Notez qu'une fois que votre vaisseau a commencé à se déplacer, l'ordre correspondant ne peut pas être annulé.
languages.original_text:
Void movement points (VMP) determine how far a ship can move on their turn.
1 VMP corresponds to one cell on the battlefield. Moving diagonally is more costly — every second diagonal cell uses 2 VMP.
At the beginning of each turn, void movement points are restored to their maximum value. The higher a ship's {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} rating is, the more VMP it gets.
Note that once your ship starts moving, this order can no longer be cancelled.

traits.locale_text:
Les{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:*__MovementPointsSpace**}PD{/g}) déterminent la distance qu'un vaisseau peut parcourir lors de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
1 PD correspond à une case du champ de bataille. Le coût des déplacements en diagonale est plus élevé : une case diagonale sur deux coûte 2 PD.
Au début de chaque tour, les points de déplacement sont restaurés à leur valeur maximale. Plus l'indice de {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}vitesse{/g} d'un vaisseau est élevé, plus il reçoit de PD.
Notez qu'une fois que votre vaisseau a commencé à se déplacer, l'ordre correspondant ne peut pas être annulé.

languages.text:
舰船移动点数决定舰船在各自的回合内可以移动多远。
每个格子消耗1点移动点数。若要移动到对角线的位置，则要消耗2点移动点数。
在每个回合开始时，移动点数会恢复为最大值。舰船的{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}等级越高，每个回合的移动点数就越多。
请注意，一旦您的舰船开始移动之后，就无法再取消移动命令了。
languages.original_text:
Void movement points (VMP) determine how far a ship can move on their turn.
1 VMP corresponds to one cell on the battlefield. Moving diagonally is more costly — every second diagonal cell uses 2 VMP.
At the beginning of each turn, void movement points are restored to their maximum value. The higher a ship's {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} rating is, the more VMP it gets.
Note that once your ship starts moving, this order can no longer be cancelled.

traits.locale_text:
舰船移动点数决定舰船在各自的回合内可以移动多远。
每个格子消耗1点移动点数。若要移动到对角线的位置，则要消耗2点移动点数。
在每个回合开始时，移动点数会恢复为最大值。舰船的{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}速度{/g}等级越高，每个回合的移动点数就越多。
请注意，一旦您的舰船开始移动之后，就无法再取消移动命令了。

languages.original_text:
Movement points (MP) determine how far a ship can move on their turn.
1 MP corresponds to one cell on the battlefield. Moving diagonally is more costly — every second diagonal cell uses 2 MP.
At the beginning of each turn, movement points are restored to their maximum value. The higher a ship's {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} rating is, the more MP they get.
Note that once your ship starts moving, this order can no longer be cancelled.

languages.text:
Los puntos de movimiento del vacío (PMV) determinan hasta dónde puede moverse una nave en su turno.
1 PMV se corresponde con una casilla del campo de batalla. El movimiento diagonal cuesta más: una sola casilla cuesta 1 PMV, pero la segunda siempre cuesta 2.
Al principio de cada turno, los puntos de movimiento del vacío vuelven a su nivel máximo. Cuanto mayor sea la {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g} de una nave, más PMV tiene.
Ten en cuenta que una vez tu nave empieza a moverse, no puedes cancelar el movimiento.
languages.original_text:
Void movement points (VMP) determine how far a ship can move on their turn.
1 VMP corresponds to one cell on the battlefield. Moving diagonally is more costly — every second diagonal cell uses 2 VMP.
At the beginning of each turn, void movement points are restored to their maximum value. The higher a ship's {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} rating is, the more VMP it gets.
Note that once your ship starts moving, this order can no longer be cancelled.

traits.locale_text:
Los {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:*__MovementPointsSpace**}PM{/g}) determinan hasta dónde puede moverse una nave en su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
1 PM se corresponde con una casilla del campo de batalla. El movimiento diagonal cuesta más: una sola casilla cuesta 1 PM, pero la segunda siempre cuesta 2.
Al principio de cada turno, los puntos de movimiento vuelven a su nivel máximo. Cuanto mayor sea la {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}velocidad{/g} de una nave, más PM tiene.
Ten en cuenta que una vez tu nave empieza a moverse, no puedes cancelar el movimiento.

languages.text:
ヴォイド移動ポイント（VMP）は、その船が自分のターンに移動できる距離を示している。
1VMPは戦場で1セルに相当。斜め移動は消費MPが高くなり、斜めに1セル移動するごとに2VMPを消費する。
各ターンの開始時に、移動ポイントは最大値まで回復する。船の{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}スピード{/g}が速いほど、VMPも多くなる。
なお、船が移動を始めると、その行動はキャンセルできないので注意が必要。
languages.original_text:
Void movement points (VMP) determine how far a ship can move on their turn.
1 VMP corresponds to one cell on the battlefield. Moving diagonally is more costly — every second diagonal cell uses 2 VMP.
At the beginning of each turn, void movement points are restored to their maximum value. The higher a ship's {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}speed{/g} rating is, the more VMP it gets.
Note that once your ship starts moving, this order can no longer be cancelled.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}（{g|Encyclopedia:*__MovementPointsSpace**}MP{/g}）により船がその{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に移動できる距離が決まる。
1MPは戦場の1セルに相当する。対角線上の移動は消費量が多くなり、セルごとに2MPを消費する。
移動ポイントは、各ターンの開始時に最大値まで回復する。船の{g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}スピード{/g}が上がると獲得するMPが増える。
船が動き出したらこの指示は取り消せないので注意しよう。

languages.text:
Uçsuz hareket puanı (UHP), bir geminin turu sırasında ne kadar uzağa gidebileceğini belirler.
1 UHP, çatışma alanında bir hücreye denk düşer. Çapraz ilerlemenin bedeli yüksektir. Her çapraz hücre 2 UHP harcar.
Her turun başında, uçsuz hareket puanları yeniden maksimum değerine çıkar. Geminin {g|Encyclopedia:SpeedSpace}hızı{/g} ne kadar yüksekse o kadar çok UHP'ye sahip olur.
Gemin hareket etmeye başladığında, o komutun artık iptal edilemeyeceğini unutma.
